steps.text: Mix all dry ingredients together and set aside
Whisk all wet ingredients well (except for shredded carrot)
Mix dry into wet (roughly) and add shredded carrot to incorporate
Bake at 350 for 24 mins
Slice chicken breasts in half lengthwise to get 4 thinner pieces
Salt each side of breast with salt and leave at room temperature for 15 mins
Cover all sides with pesto and rest for another 5 mins
Place pieces in air fryer on parchment pepper and cook at 390F for 8 mins or until internal temperature reaches 160
Mix all marinade together and then mix the chicken with marinade. Put in fridge for 30 minutes
line air fryer with aluminum foil.. raise edges so that marinade doesn't drain. Cook chicken in air fryer at 390F for 8-10 minutes
Serve chicken with pita, hummus, tzatziki, sliced veggies (tomato, cucumber), olives and feta cheese

ingredients.element: sausage (tuscan or could sub for more garlic sausage)

steps.text: pat chicken thighs dry with paper towel and then season both sides
place instant pot on saute mode and add oil, then brown both sides of chicken (about 3 minutes each) as well as shrimps  and remove from pot
dice all the veggies into small pieces. Mince garlic finely
saute sausage until brown and then add all the vegies until softened. Add in tomato paste and spices and saute until combined
pour in 1/2 cup of veggie stock to the instant pot and deglaze fully
add browned chicken to the pot and then on top, add rinsed jasmine rice, then 1.5 cups of veggie stock on top, ensuring all the rice is fully submerged in liquid
layer the diced tomatoes on top. DO NOT MIX (should be: veggies and chicken, rice, broth, tomatoes)
Cook at high pressure for 7 minutes with 10 minutes of natural release
add in shrimp and then mix to combine - may have to add salt to taste

title: Chicken Enchiladas

steps.text: Enchilada sauce

Heat oil in a small saucepan over medium-high heat. Add flour and cook for 1 minute, whisking constantly.  Add in the chili powder, garlic powder, cumin and oregano and cook for 1 more minute, whisking constantly.

Gradually pour in the stock, whisking constantly to combine until no lumps remain.  Continue cooking until the sauce reaches a simmer.  Then reduce heat to medium-low to maintain the simmer (the sauce should continue lightly bubbling) for about 10-15 minutes, uncovered, until the sauce has slightly thickened.
Give the sauce a taste and season with salt, as needed. Makes enough sauce for 1 large batch of enchiladas
Instant pot Chicken
Add all ingredients (except for salsa) into instant pot and mix to combine
add salsa on top and then seal and cook on high pressure for 8 minutes with quick release
Shred chicken mixture
Enchilada filling
Heat oil in wok and then add garlic clove, diced chipotle pepper and onion and cook until a bit softened. Add bell pepper and mushroom and cook until veggies are softenend.
Add in shredded chicken mixture and halved cherry tomatoes. Season with salt as needed (should be not too salty as will be adding enchilada sauce and cheese)
Assembly
Place about ½ cup of enchilada sauce into the bottom of an oven proof cooking pan and spread to cover.

For each enchilada: take a tortilla and place about 1 tbsp of enchilada sauce on to moisten, add enchilada filling and then a little bit of cheese, roll up and then place into the cooking pan fold side down.
Cover enchiladas with sauce and then top with remaining cheese
Bake uncovered at 350F for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Broil for about 2 minutes on high. Serve with chopped cilantro on top.

notes: Serve with refried beans and Mexican red rice

ingredients.element: oyster sauce (divided into 2 tbsp and 0.5 tbsp)

steps.text: Mix all the sauce ingredients (oyster sauce, soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, sugar and water) and set aside
stir fry veggies and shrimp separate with some oyster sauce, teriyaki sauce and mushroom powder
Stir fry onions, with udon noodles (prepared according to instructions) with sauce
prepare tofu by cubing, tossing with some udon sauce and air frying for about 10 minutes on air fry setting
mix everything together
Combine the sauce ingredients except sesame oil and seeds, and mix well
Rinse the chicken pieces, drain, and pat dry with paper towels.
Press the “Saute” button on the Instant Pot. When the pot is hot, add 1 tablespoon of canola or vegetable oil. Sear the pieces on both sides. Deglaze with 0.25 cup of water
Add in all vegies (cubed into fairly large chunks - no need to remove the skin on the squash or potatoes)
Pour the sauce over, and mix well to evenly coat the chicken and vegetables.
Cook at high pressure for 10 minutes with quick release
Set to sauté to reduce sauce to desired level
Mix marinade ingredients (lime juice, orange juice, 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 garlic clove minced, 0.5 tsp cumin powder, salt)
Cut chicken breasts lengthwise into thinner halves and then salt both sides. Marinate chicken overnight
cook chicken: cook chicken in frying pan at medium -high heat for 4 mins each side, add some of the marinade to the pan and de glaze with some water. Remove and cover chicken to heat through

veggies: slice veggies into strips and lay on pan (with leftover chicken juice) and let cook undisturbed for one minute. Shake it up and repeat process 3 times (at the end, add some water and a pinch of salt along with some cumin, chili powder, paprika and oregano)
Cut chicken and add to a big bowl, add cooked veggies and toss along with a good squeeze of lime and chopped cilantro
When ready to serve, reheat everything in the pan
serve on tortilla , fresh salsa, guacamole, Greek yogurt/ sour cream and cheese
blend all ingredients together until smooth
serve on toast with a poached/ fried egg and some feta cheese
Pickled carrots
Combine the pickle brine in a saucepan and boil on medium heat until the sugar dissolves (3 to 4 minutes). Stir occasionally. Remove from the heat and cool it down.

Place the julienned carrots into a sterile pickling jar and pour over the brine. Close the lid. Gently move the jar around a little bit to make sure the brine is touching the all radishes and carrots.
Leave the jar at room temperature for 3 to 4 hours then move to the fridge. Chill the pickles for 30 mins to 1 hour before serving for optimal taste.
Air Fryer Tofu
Press tofu for 30 minutes to draw out excess moisture . Cube into pieces
In a medium size bowl place the pressed and cubed tofu. Add in liquid aminos and toss to coat. Add in all of the other seasoning ingredients including the oil and toss to thoroughly combine.

Place in your air fryer in a single row, so that all the tofu has a little bit of space around each piece. Set your air fryer to 400°F. Cook for 10 minutes, shaking the basket after 5 minutes, then continuing to cook.
Assembly
Crisp up chickpeas in a frying pan with some oil and spices of choice

Each bowl: place ½ cup of cooked quinoa at bottom of bowl, then top with one portion of crispy tofu, some pickled carrot, ¼ cup edamame, ¼ cup corn,½ cup of chickpeas,¼ cup chopped cucumber, cilantro, cashew and drizzle with a serving of prepared Miso-Ginger dressing

title: Peanut Satay Ramen (with mushroom and tofu)

steps.text: In a medium-large pot, add some oil to the pot and then stir fry the ginger and garlic together, followed by mushrooms and crumbled extra firm tofu. Sauté for 5 minutes
Add peanut butter and 4 cups of veggie stock to deglaze the pot - add shrimp. Then leave uncovered and boil for 5 minutes
For each serving bowl, add in the following: 0.5 tbsp Cane sugar, 0.5 tsp rice vinegar, 1 tbsp soy sauce and 0.5 tsp sesame oil and then whisk to combine
Boil ramen noodles (2 servings) as per instructions. Add bok choy (Sliced) at the same time so that they cook as well (boil for 4 minutes top). Drain
To the serving bowl (with soy mixture) , add in one serving of ramen noodles and top with 1/2 of prepared broth
top with chili oil, sesame seeds, chopped cilantro, crushed peanuts and enjoy
Mix all dry ingredients together
Whisk eggs well, add rest of wet ingredients (including sugar) and mix to combine
mix dry into wet and gently combine
Bake at 350F for 1 hour in loaf pan
Place bacon on cold frying pan and then cook on low-medium until done. Drain out most of oil
cook bell pepper (diced) in the bacon oil. Scramble eggs in same pan at low heat and then remove
prepare potatoes by tossing cubed potatoes with oil and some salt and seasoning of choice (chili powder, cumin powder) and cook in air fryer at Roast Temp (375) for 15 minutes
Melt half of cheese on wrap (microwave for 15 minutes)
assemble: egg mixture, bacon strip, some potatoes then roll up
heat on frying pan for about 2 minutes each side to seal
serve with yogurt (sour cream) and salsa
Chop green onion super finely. Chop kimchi into small pieces
Boil noodles according to package instructions until al dente and then immediately wash in cold water and drain.
To large bowl, add in kimchi, noodles, green onion and all sauce ingredients. Mix and then add the seaweed by crumbling it in with your hands
top with more green onion as desired along with 2 boiled eggs
boiled eggs: put eggs into a small pot, cover and cook at high until boiling. Reduce heat to medium and then continue boiling for 5 minutes. Immediately place in cold water and peel.
Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat.  Add onion, pepper, cilantro and salt. Lightly cook until the onion is translucent
Add the beans with broth and toss with the spices and oil. Add the Salsa Lizano.
Add the cooked rice to the skillet and toss until well combined with the beans and spices. Heat thoroughly and serve- preferably with fried eggs,
Cookies
Cream together butter and sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer until smooth.
Beat in eggs and vanilla. Stir in flour, baking powder, and salt. Cover, and chill dough for at least 1 hour (or overnight).
Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F
Lightly dust a work surface with flour. Roll out dough to 1/4 to 1/2 inch thickness.
Cut into shapes with any cookie cutter. Place cookies 1 inch apart on ungreased baking sheets.
Bake in the preheated oven until cookies are lightly browned, 6 to 8 minutes. Carefully transfer cookies to a wire rack and cool completely before decorating.
Icing
In a large bowl, combine powdered sugar (1 ¾ cups), milk (3 tablespoons), vanilla extract (1 teaspoon), almond extract (½ teaspoon), and salt (¼ teaspoon).
Use a rubber spatula to stir mixture until smooth.
The consistency should be thick enough that it won't run off cookies, but thin enough that the icing "melts" back in on itself when you drizzle a spoonful over the bowl.
Tip: If your icing looks too dry, add 1 teaspoon of milk until it looks like the consistency in the video. If it is too thin, add 1 tablespoon of powdered sugar
soak noodles in warm water for 2 minutes until softened then rinse with cold water and set aside
cube tofu into small pieces, mix with a bat of sauce and corn satarch then air fry for 12 minutes
stir-fry veggies (except onion, garlic and bean sprouts) until tender and set aside
stir fry eggs. set aside
stir fry garlic and onions until softened. Add noddles, oil and rest of sauce and cook until done
add in toppings (bean sprouts, cilantro, crushed peanuts and lime juice)
Whisk together all sauce ingredients
boil noodles according to instructions then rinse in cold water
chop all veggies into small thin pieces
mix all ingredients together and top with cilantro and crushed peanuts
Prepare chickpeas: soak in water and then cook in instant pot with 3 cups of water at high pressure for 16 minutes and then quick release.
Bake chickpeas: coat cooked chickpeas with 1 Tbsp of olive oil and seasoning (dill, salt and lemon and herb mix). Roast in oven at 375F for 25 minutes
prepare couscous according to instructions: add 1 cup of boiling water to 1 cup of couscous, cover for 5 minutes and then fluff
chop all veggies into small pieces: tomato (remove seeds and juice part), bell pepper, red onion and mince garlic
combine everything together and season with salt as needed
Preheat oven to 350 F
Cream all wet ingredients (softened butter, 1 egg, vanilla extract, sugar) until well combined
Mix dry into wet
Stir in oats, walnuts (optional) and chocolate chips
Form 24 balls and place on a cookie sheet lined with parchment paper  and bake at 350F for 10-12 minutes

Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with an electric mixer on low speed until mostly incorporated, 1 to 2 minutes. Increase speed to medium-high and beat until light and fluffy, another 2 to 3 minutes. Beat in egg yolk, then molasses.
To wet: Beat in egg yolk, then molasses.
Whisk sifted flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, cloves, ginger, and nutmeg in a separate bowl until well combined.
Gradually add flour mixture to the molasses mixture, beating until well blended and smooth.
Divide dough in half and form each into a 1-inch-thick disk. Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 to 3 hours, or overnight
When ready to bake, preheat the oven to 350 degrees F

Working with one disk at a time, and leaving remaining disk in the refrigerator, unwrap chilled dough and place on a lightly floured surface. Working from the center to the edges, roll dough with a floured rolling pin to a thickness of 1/4 inch.

Cut dough into desired shapes with cookie cutters, dipping the cutters into flour as needed so they don't stick to the dough. Fit the cookie cutters as closely together as possible to cut as many cookies as you can. This will minimize the number of times you have to re-roll the dough
Bake each sheet in the preheated oven until firm, 8 to 10 minutes. Transfer cookies to wire racks to cool
Frost or decorate cooled gingerbread cookies as desired.
Preheat oven to 375 F. Grease two baking pans
Grate zucchini and squeeze out excess water
Mix together the oats, cinnamon, cocoa, nutmeg, baking powder and salt in one bowl.
In another, mix the milk, maple syrup, eggs, coconut oil, vanilla, banana, zucchini, . Mix into the dry ingredients

Transfer mixture to the two baking dishes. Sprinkle with chocolate chips and hemp hearts. Bake for 22-25 minutes or until golden brown on the outsides and firm to the touch. Allow to cool before cutting into pieces.

ingredients.fdcQuery: Milk, lowfat, fluid, 1% milkfat, with added nonfat milk solids, vitamin A and vitamin D

steps.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
Cook the bacon (start with cold pan then cook on low-medium heat until crispy). Remove bacon and drain on paper plate, take out half of the bacon fat

Madeline potatoes into thin slices, slice all other veggies into thin pieces. 
To the skillet with the bacon drippings, add the diced onions and  potatoes. Cook for 8 to 10 minutes, until the potatoes are very tender and browned, stirring gently from time to time so that the potatoes cook evenly.
Meanwhile, in a medium bowl, whisk together the eggs, Dijon, milk, salt, and pepper until well combined. Stir in the cheese.
Once the potatoes are tender, add the spinach and mushrooms,  stir and cook until the greens are wilted, 1 to 2 minutes.
In a large pyrex baking dish, spread the potatoes, greens, and bacon (crumbled)  into a single layer
Carefully pour over the egg mixture, smoothing the top.
Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, just until the eggs are set (the cooking time may vary based on your skillet, so keep an eye on it). Slice and serve immediately.
NOTE: can use other protein (i.e. sausage) and whatever veggies you would like

title: Japanese Curry

ingredients.element: chicken thigh (boneless and skinless) - or use bone in chicken drumstick (900g)
ingredients.fdcQuery: Chicken, broilers or fryers, thigh, meat and skin, raw

steps.text: Cut all veggies into LARGE chunks (to ensure they don’t over cook). Mince garlic

Lightly season the skin side of chicken thighs or drumsticks with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper. Add 1 tbsp (15ml) peanut oil in pressure cooker. Ensure to coat the oil over whole bottom of the pot. Carefully place the chicken thighs skin side down (or drumsticks) in pressure cooker. Lightly season the other side with kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper. Brown for 3.5 - 4 mins on each side without flipping. Remove and set aside in a large mixing bowl.
Add onion slices in pressure cooker and saute until soften (~ 2 minutes). Add in minced garlic and ginger, then saute until fragrant (~30 seconds).
Pour in ½ cup (125ml) cold water and completely deglaze the pot
Place chicken and the flavorful meat juice in the pressure cooker. Add in 1 tbsp (15ml) Worcestershire sauce & 1 tbsp (15ml) Japanese soy sauce. Layer carrot, kabocha and potato chunks on top

Close lid and pressure cook at High Pressure:
-Chicken Thighs: 5 Minutes + 10 Minutes Natural Release
-Chicken Drumsticks: 6 Minutes + 10 Minutes Natural Release
-Chicken Cubes: 2 Minutes + 10 Minutes Natural Release

Remove and set aside the potato, carrot and kabocha chunks and chicken. Press Cancel button, then Sauté button to heat up the sauce. Stir-in Japanese curry roux one cube at a time to thicken the sauce. Taste the sauce after each curry roux has melted, then determine if more cubes are necessary.
Place chicken and vegetable chunks back in the sauce. Serve with rice.

notes: for a curry with more sauce: dissolve the roux cubes in 1 cup of boiling water and add this mixture to the instant pot

title: Char Siu Bao (Bbq Pork Buns)

steps.text: Making Dough - total resting: 2 hours, 15 minutes

In the bowl of an electric mixer fitted with a dough hook attachment , dissolve the yeast in the warm water. Sift together the flour and cornstarch, and add it to the yeast mixture along with the sugar and oil.
Turn on the mixer to the lowest setting and let it go until a smooth dough ball is formed. Cover with a damp cloth and let it rest for 2 hours.

After your dough has rested for 2 hours, add the baking powder to the dough and turn the mixer on to the lowest setting. At this point, if the dough looks dry or you're having trouble incorporating the baking powder, add 1-2 teaspoons water. Gently knead the dough until it becomes smooth again.
Cover with a damp cloth and let it rest for another 15 minutes.
Making filling
Heat the oil in a wok over medium high heat. Add the onion and stir-fry for a minute.
Turn heat down to medium-low, and add the sugar, soy sauce, oyster sauce, sesame oil, and dark soy. Stir and cook until the mixture starts to bubble up.
Add the chicken stock and flour, cooking for a couple minutes until thickened. Remove from the heat and stir in the roast pork (see Charsiu pork recipe).
Set aside filling to cool. If you make the filling ahead of time, cover and refrigerate to prevent it from drying out.
Assembly/ steaming
Cut parchment paper into 12 4x4 inch squares.

Roll the fully rested dough into a long tube and divide it into 12 equal pieces. Press each piece of dough into a disc about 4 1/2 inches in diameter (it should be thicker in the center and thinner around the edges).
Add some filling and pleat the buns until they're closed on top.
Place each bun on a parchment paper square, and place in a steaming basket.

Instant pot method: fill instant pot with 1 cup of water and place trivet down in the pot. Place steamer basket on the trivet and close the bamboo lid on top. Close InstantPot lid, put valve on sealing, and pressure cook on high for 4 minutes with 10 minutes natural release.

notes:
- Bao buns must be all steamed before storing/ freezing - to freeze, ensure the buns are fully cooled, place them on parchment piece and then freeze in single layer in freezer before putting them in a bag 
- to reheat, can use the instant pot method or cover with a damp paper cloth and microwave for 40 seconds

ingredients.fdcQuery: Cocoa, dry powder, unsweetened, HERSHEY'S European Style Cocoa

steps.text: Preheat oven to 350˚F with the rack in the center of the oven. Fill a 12-count muffin tin with cupcake liners.
In a large mixing bowl, thoroughly whisk together dry ingredients, breaking up most of the cocoa clumps.
In a second mixing bowl, whisk together wet ingredients.
Pour wet ingredients over dry ingredients and whisk just until the ingredients come together and no dry streaks remain. Batter will be a little loose and lumpy.

Add batter to tins: fill each cup 2/3 full (do not over-fill). Bake 18-22 min (20 minutes average), until a toothpick inserted in the center, comes out clean. Cool 5 minutes in the pan then transfer to a rack to cool completely to room temperature before frosting.

ingredients.fdcQuery: Milk, reduced fat, fluid, 2% milkfat, with added nonfat milk solids and vitamin A and vitamin D

steps.text: Mix together flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, ginger, and salt in large bowl
In a second bowl, add eggs, sugar, pumpkin, milk, and butter; beat well. (HINT: make sure butter is fully melted)
Gently fold in the flour mixture
Bake according to waffle maker instructions. 1 cup of batter = 1 waffle
Serve with Krema Vanilla yogurt and fruit. Drizzle maple syrup on top
Blend all ingredients together until smooth
add in water to thin to desired consistency

serve with pasta of choice. 
Some ideas: Roasted vegetables (cherry tomatoes or bell pepper) , turkey meatballs, shrimp
Beat the butter and sugar together until the butter is light and fluffy, about 3-5 minutes.
Add eggs and ube extract. Mix together until well combined.
In a separate bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Add the coconut flakes, and mix the dry ingredients together.
With the stand mixer on low speed, slowly add the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients a little bit at a time, just until combined (do not over mix).Add chocolate chips
scoop out the cookies onto a parchment paper-lined baking sheet.
Chill the dough for at least 1 hour in the fridge.
Bake in a pre-heated 350ºF (175ºC) oven for 12 minutes, or just until the edges of the cookie has set (do not over bake).
Allow cookies to fully cool before enjoying

Beat softened butter and sugar together in a large bowl with an electric mixer until light and fluffy.
Stir in vanilla; add flour and mix well until combined.
Fill cookie press with dough and form cookies onto two ungreased cookie sheets, spacing them about 1 ½ inches apart.
Bake until the edges of the cookies are just starting to turn golden brown, about 10 to 12 minutes.
Cool cookies on wire rack
Melt chocolate by placing in a bowl and microwaving in 30 seconds intervals
dip each cookie into the chocolate so that half of them are covered in chocolate
Dry on wire rack completely before serving

ingredients.fdcQuery: Candies, semisweet chocolate, made with butter

steps.text: Heat oven to 350°F (180°C). Grease bottom only of 9x5-inch (20 x 13 cm) loaf pan.
Combine all dry ingredients together into a bowl and whisk to blend
combine all wet ingredients (egg, oil, sugar, vanilla extract and mashed bananas) and mix to combine (can use stand mixer if making a double batch)
Combine dry into wet and mix to just combine

Boil water and cook noodles according to instructions (not fully - it'll finish in the sauce)
Press tofu with paper towels to remove excess water and then slice into small cubes.
Cook all veggies (Except the garlic and onion) with some water and a bit of oyster sauce and set aside
Cook the Shrimp and tofu in a pan with half of the bacon fat and a bit of oyster sauce and set aside.

title: Yeungman Cooking Spiced Chickpea With Rice

ingredients.fdcQuery: Tomato products, canned, paste, without salt added (Includes foods for USDA's Food Distribution Program)
Chickpeas (garbanzo beans, bengal gram), mature seeds, canned, drained, rinsed in tap water
Lemon juice from concentrate, bottled, REAL LEMON

steps.text: rice
Rinse and drain the long grain rice 2-3 times to get rid of the excess starch

Heat up a small saucepan to medium low heat.  Add the olive oil, tomato paste, chili flakes, and a pinch of salt.  Gently cook for a few minutes.  Add the rice to the saucepan and give it a good stir, then add 1 cup of water
When the water begins to bubble, give it a stir and turn the heat down to medium low.  Cover and cook for 15min
After 15mins, turn the heat off on the rice and let it steam further for 10mins
chickpeas
Finely chop the garlic.  Thinly slice the onion and shred carrot
Heat up a sauté pan to medium heat.  Add the chili oil followed by the onions.  Sauté for 3-4mins.

Add the garlic and sauté for a couple of minutes.  Add the carro and sauté for another couple of minutes.  Add the cumin, sweet paprika, smoked paprika, turmeric, and 0.5 tsp of salt.  Give the pan a good stir
Add the chickpeas followed by a 1/4 cup of water.  Give the pan a stir and cook for another few minutes
Add rest of the water to the spiced chickpeas, increase heat to boil and then cover and reduce heat to medium and let it cook for 10 minutes until chickpeas are full softened
Once chickpeas are cooked, open and stir and add the lemon juice, sugar and chopped cilantro. Season with additional salt to taste
Plate the rice and chickpeas.

notes: Original recipe called for 0.5 red bell pepper cut in thin slices but I subbed carrot
