ingredients.element: tamarind juice (1.5 tbsp of paste with 3 tbsp of water)

steps.text: Peel and cut yellow potatoes and carrot - steam in a steamer until softened and set aside

Salt and pepper the skin of the chicken and then pan fry then in a wok for about 3 minutes on each side until crispy. Take out the chicken and add the whole can of coconut milk to the wok and heat until boiling
Add the chicken back into the wok of coconut milk, reduce heat to medium-low, put on the lid and simmer for 20 minutes (flipping the chicken at half way point)

In a separate pot: Add 1 cup of coconut cream and heat until separated. Add the massaman paste and heat until mixed through. Add this to the chicken mixture (along with the spices and tamarind juice  and fish sauce)
Lastly, in a small frying pan, stir fry the onion and chopped green beans until softened
Combine all the components into the wok with the chicken and sauce: steamed veggies and the stir fried onion and green beans
served topped with crushed roasted peanuts (un-salted)
Chicken
Pound and make slits on chicken breast. Salt both sides and let sit in fridge while you make the yogurt marinade
Combine all listed ingredients above to make the marinade. Marinate the chicken in the mixture and let sit in the fridge for a minimum of 4 hours
Air fry the chicken on aluminum foil at 390F for 8 minutes on each side or until 160F internal temperature is reached
cover the chicken in aluminum and set aside while you make the gravy. When ready, chop into bite sized pieces
Sauce

In an instant pot, saute ginger, garlic, thai chili and onion with the butter and salt for a few minutes until softened. Add in spices and toast for a  minute to bring out the fragrance  then deglaze with the water (0.5 to 0.75 cup)
Add chopped tomatoes, DO NOT STIR, cover and pressure cook on high for 5 minutes with 5 minutes natural release
Puree the sauce
Add in the whipping cream, cilantro, fennelgreek, sugar and chicken pieces  and heat through.
Make tuna: thaw tuna and chop into very small pieces and mix with the marinade of choice and put in fridge for about 15 minutes
Make slaw: Slice the veggies into thin matchsticks and mix with the marinade and keep in fridge until read to use (10 minutes)
Spicy crab mix: mix ingredients together until combined (if making it non-spicy, simply omit the sriracha)

Assemble for each bowl: place 100 gm of cooked sushi rice at bottom of bowl, top with: sashimi tuna, crab mixture, veggie slaw, one-half of an avocado sliced and optional toppings (tempura, fruit, edamame, kewpie mayo, crumbled seaweed)

Turn on the sauté function on your Instant Pot (to the default “Normal” — not high or low). Once hot, add water (or oil), onion, garlic, and ginger. Season with a healthy pinch each salt and pepper and stir. Sauté for 3-5 minutes, stirring frequently, or until onion is translucent and fragrant. Add a little bit more water as needed to prevent sticking

Add butternut squash and stir. Sauté for 5-7 minutes, stirring frequently and adding a little more water as needed to prevent sticking (we added 2 Tbsp (30 ml)). Butternut squash should be slightly tender when pierced with a fork or knife
Turn off the sauté function by pressing “Cancel.” Then add red lentils, vegetable broth, water, turmeric, cinnamon, clove (optional), cayenne, and sea salt, and stir.

Put on the Instant Pot lid and turn to seal. Pressure cook on HIGH for 5 minutes (it will take about 5-10 minutes for the Instant Pot to pressurize before cooking begins). Once the timer goes off, let the steam release naturally (~15 minutes), or carefully press the quick release if in a hurry. Turn off the Instant Pot by pressing “Cancel.”
Carefully open the lid and add coconut milk and sugar (optional) and purée with an immersion blender until smooth
Leftovers will keep 4-5 days in the refrigerator or up to 1 month in the freezer. Reheat in a saucepan on the stovetop.
Drain and rinse black beans - add to a bowl with the corn.
Finely dice the onion, mince the garlic, and roughly chop the cilantro.
Add the onion, garlic, cilantro, shredded cheddar, and taco seasoning to the bowl with the beans and corn. Stir until everything is evenly combined and coated in seasoning.

Place a half cup of the filling on one side of each tortilla and fold over. Cook the quesadillas in a skillet over medium heat on each side until brown and crispy and the cheesy filling has melted. Slice into triangles then serve.

o freeze the quesadillas, stack the filled and uncooked quesadillas with a piece of parchment paper between each quesadilla. Place in a freezer bag and freeze for up to three months. To reheat either microwave (for a soft quesadilla) or cook in a skillet on low heat (make sure to use low heat so that the filling has time to thaw and melt before the outside burns).
Variations: Sub half of the black beans with other proteins: chopped chicken breast, scrambled eggs etc.
Place instant pot on saute mode: add oil, minced garlic, onion and bell pepper and cook until veggies are softened
Add all the spices and salt along with the rinsed rice and cook until toasty.
Deglaze with the broth (or water if you don't have broth)  - add the rest of the broth and frozen peas and make sure all the rice is submerged in the water
Add tomato paste on top and DO NOT MIX
Pressure cook on high for 6 minutes with 10 minute natural release
Fluff rice, add lime juice and chopped cilantro and serve.

ingredients.element: spinach (could be one bunch or one bag of baby)
garlic cloves (divided as 3 whole and 2 finely chopped)
coconut milk (or could sub heavy cream)

steps.text: Blanch spinach in boiled water for 2-3 minutes. place in cold water right away
Add blanched spinach, tomatoes, 3 whole garlic cloves, jalapeno in blender and blend. Set aside
Cook 2 cloves of minced garlic and onion in 1 tbsp of oil until softened
add spinach mix and water to the pan and cook with lid on for 5 minutes tops (cooking more will cause browning)
blend mixture with a hand blender
add spices, coconut milk, sugar, and salt
prepare the paneer by adding cubes to boiled water for 1 minute then drain in cold water
add paneer to sauce and warm through
serve with lemon juice and fenugreek
mix dry ingredients together
Mix all wet ingredients (except zucchini and dark chocolate chunks)
mix wet with dry and then add zucchini and dark chocolate chunks to combine
bake at 360F for 50 minutes in a loaf pan
let cool for at least 15 minutes before slicing
Mince veggies very finely
rinse and dry beans
mix dressing ingredients together
combine everything into a bowl and serve with tortilla chips or add to your burritos

ingredients.fdcQuery: Eggs, Grade A, Large, egg whole

steps.text: Poach eggs: Boil water (half-full) in a shallow pot (wok is good) and add 1 Tbsp of vinegar when a gentle boil is reached. Carefully lower each egg (place each egg in a 1/3 measuring cup ) into the water and poach for about 4 minutes. Remove eggs from water with a slotted spoon and immediately place in cold water

Prepare hollandaise sauce according to instructions: Melt butter in small saucepan, add water and 1/2 of sauce packet and cook uncovered on high-medium heat for about 3 minutes until thickened. Keep whisking during process
Toast English muffin and top each half in the following order: Mashed/ sliced avocado, generous amount of crab meat, poached egg and then smoked salmon on top. Top with your hollandaise sauce
Serve with air fryer roast potatoes

ingredients.element: corn starch (mixed with 4 tbsp of water to make starch slurry)

steps.text: Prep veggies by dicing into small pieces. Mince garlic finely
Heat a large pan with 2 tablespoons of oil over medium high heat. Add the onion, 1/2 of the chopped scallion, garlic, and gochugaru, and stir-fry until fragrant, 2 - 3 minutes.
Add the meat, and cook until the meat is no longer pink, breaking up with a wooden spoon, 2 to 3 minutes.
Add the soy sauce, doenjang, gochujang, and sugar and stir to blend with the meat. Add the bell peppers and cook briefly until slightly softened.
Add 2 cups of water to the pan, and bring it to a boil
Add the tofu into the pan and cook for 15 minutes at a low simmer

Gently stir in the starch slurry to thicken the sauce, and then the sesame oil. Cook for another minute or so to bring everything together. Garnish with the remaining scallion, and serve hot with steamed rice.
Preheat oven to 350F
In a small bowl, whisk together dry ingredients -  all purpose flour, baking soda, salt, cornstarch, and matcha powder
In a mixing bowl, add the room temperature butter, brown sugar, and white sugar. Beat for about a minute until smooth (HINT: do not over whip as this will make the cookies too fluffy)
Add the egg, egg yolk, and vanilla extract. Beat again until smooth.
Add the dry to the wet and combine until a dough forms.Add white chocolate chips and then form cookies into balls.
Put the balls in the freezer for 10 minutes

Place the balls on baking sheet lined with parchment paper (About 6 cookies per tray) and press down so they’re flat. 
Bake for 10 minutes - halfway through, take the tray out and bang it  down so that the cookie loses some air (Resulting in chewier cookies)
Once out of the oven, leave the cookies on the baking tray for 10 minutes before transferring them onto a cooling rack
Eat once fully cooled for the best chewy texture
Finely dice all the vegetables
prep tofu by squeezing out all the water and then crumbling. Mix with 0.5tsp chicken powder and 1 tsp of sesame oil

Place the ground pork, cabbage, ginger (freshly grated), garlic, green onions, salt, sugar, soy sauce, sesame oil in a mixing bowl; mix everything with your hands, knead it for two minutes or when everything is incorporated, and homogenized.
Fill and wrap the dumplings. May freeze at this point

To cook: heat oil on a frying pan on medium heat, place dumplings down and let fry for about 2 mins, then add ⅓ cup of water to the pan, cover with a lid and simmer for about 5 mins. Remove lid and let the rest of the water evaporate.
Preheat oven to 375F
Drain and rinse the beans, then place on a plate and microwave them until a bit dry
Chop mushrooms, onion and garlic, shred the carrot.
Cook all the veggies (onion, carrot, mushrooms, garlic, peas, and corn) in a pan with oil and then blot out the excess liquid with a paper towel

Place the cooked veggies in a food processor with the remaining ingredients (cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, smoked paprika, bread crumbs, cheese, eggs, mayo, hoisin , bbq sauce and chipotle pepper). Pulse everything together, then add the black beans. Pulse the mixture, leaving some larger chunks of beans.
Form into patties—about 1/3 cup of mixture in each.
Place patties on a parchment paper lined baking sheet and bake at 375°F (191°C) for 10 minutes on each side, 20 minutes total

ingredients.fdcQuery: Chicken, broilers or fryers, drumstick, meat only, cooked, braised

steps.text: Rinse rice: rinse rice in Instant Pot under cold water and pour out the milky water, and continue to rinse until the water is clear, then drain well.

Pressure Cook Chicken Congee: Add ginger, 5-6 chicken drumsticks and 7 cups of cold water in Instant Pot.With Venting Knob in Venting Position, close the lid, then turn Venting Knob to Sealing Position. Pressure cook at High Pressure for 30 minutes + Natural Release. Open the lid carefully.

Thicken & Season Congee: The congee will look watery at this point. Heat up the Instant Pot using the Sauté function. Stir the congee until desired thickness & consistency, then season with salt and knox powder.
Shred Chicken: Use tongs and fork to separate the chicken meat from the bones, then remove the chicken bones and skin
Serve with chopped green onion and a drizzle of sesame oil

ingredients.fdcQuery: Salad dressing, KRAFT Mayo Light Mayonnaise

steps.text: finely grate cucumber and squeeze out excess water
in a medium size bowl, mix all ingredients together and place in fridge to chill for 30 minutes before serving
Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C). Prep two baking sheets with parchment paper.
Whisk egg white in a small bowl. Place chopped nuts in another small bowl.
Cream butter, brown sugar, and egg yolk in a mixing bowl until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes.
Add flour, vanilla, and salt; mix until well combined.
Scoop dough into 1 1/2-inch balls. Dip in egg white, then roll in walnuts until coated. Place 2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets.
Bake in the preheated oven until slightly puffed, about 5 minutes.
Remove cookies from the oven. Use your thumb to gently press an indent in the center of each cookie. Spoon jam into each thumbprint, filling it to the brim.
Return cookies to the oven and bake until set, about 8 minutes
Remove from the oven and transfer to wire racks to cool completely.

ingredients.element: sliced pork belly or 3 strips bacon
ingredients.fdcQuery: Pork, cured, bacon, pre-sliced, cooked, pan-fried

ingredients.element: head green cabbage (small; ½ lb, 227 g)

ingredients.fdcQuery: Onions, spring or scallions (includes tops and bulb), raw

steps.text: Combine all sauce ingredients together into a seperate bowl and set aside
Boil water and cook noodles according to instructions - drain and set aside
Chop all veggies into thin strips (mince garlic)
Cook cabbage, carrots and mushrooms in water and a bit of extra oyster sauce until softened and set aside

Cook off bacon until cooked but not super crispy. Set aside and drain off the bacon fat to use for cooking the noodles. If using tofu or another protein (i.e. shrimp) - simply fry in a pan with some oil and a little bit of oyster sauce until cooked.
Cook garlic and onion in about 2 tbsp of bacon oil until softened
Add noodles to the cooked garlic and onion and add in the sauce and fry until well combined
Add back in the veggies and other cooked proteins and lastly top with bacon (if using)

title: David's Pasta Salad

steps.text: cook pasta ahead of time in salted water. Put in fridge to help dry it out (this allows for salad dressing to stick better to the pasta)
chop all veggies (And crab meat) into small pieces
prepare salad dressing mix as per instructions (with 4 tbsp of olive oil and 2 tbsp vinegar) along with some salt and some spices of choice (i used green goddess mix)
combine everything (pasta, mix ins and sauce)

notes: Original recipe had salted roasted cashews added in

ingredients.element: toasted sliced almonds, can use pine nuts or pepitas
dried cranberries, can use golden raisins or dried currants

steps.text: To make the dressing, in a small bowl or jar, whisk together the olive oil, lemon juice, balsamic vinegar, Dijon mustard, honey, salt, and pepper. Set aside.

First, remove the kale stems. Squeeze the top of the kale stem and slowly move your hand down the kale stem. The leafy part of the kale will come right off as you go down. Use a sharp knife to finely chop the kale.

Place the kale in a large bowl. Drizzle the kale with just a little bit of olive oil, you don't need a ton because you are adding a dressing. Sprinkle with a little kosher salt and massage with your clean fingers until the kale softens a bit.
Drizzle the dressing over the kale and toss well. Add the Parmesan cheese, nuts, and dried fruit. Toss again and serve.
chop onion very finely
mix all ingredients together by hand and shape into 18 balls
air fry at 390 (Air fry temp setting) for 10-minutes
Mash Bananas and then whisk in very well the melted butter and sugar. Add in vanilla extract
mix together dry ingredients
Add Wet to dry and mix gently to barely combine (key to fluffy muffins) . At this point, add either blueberries or other add-ons  (walnuts, chocolate chips) . Scoop into 12 prepared muffin cups
Bake at 350F for 25 minutes

title: Korean Fried Chicken Sandwich with Kimchi

steps.text: prepare slaw: shred cabbage and carrot then mix with 1 Tbsp of mayo and salt to taste . Keep in fridge for flavour to develop

Make sauce: Prepare corn starch slurry by mixing 1 tsp of corn starch with 3 Tbsp of water and set aside. Add all sauce ingredients (rice wine vinegar, gochujang, honey, sesame oil, sugar, soy sauce, minced garlic clove, ginger) in a small sauce pan and bring to a boil, reduce heat and add the corn starch slurry and keep stirring until thickened. Remove from heat
Prep chicken: cut lengthwise to make 2 thinner filets with each breast. Pound lightly and salt lightly both sides and place in fridge for a couple hours to overnight

For each chicken filet: cover both sides in flour, then egg wash , then panko. Spray liberally with oil and cook in air fryer at 375F for 10 minutes, flip and spray the other side with oil and bake for another 7 minutes
To assemble: toast brioche bun, put some Japanese mayo on, slaw, chicken (covering both sides of chicken with your sauce) and followed by kimchi with juice squeezed out.
Chop all veggies - dice onion and mushroom, shred carrot finely and mince garlic cloves
In a large saucepan, cook onion and garlic in oil and add the veggie grounds and dark soy sauce. Add mushrooms and carrots and cook until everything is softened
Add in pasta sauce and seasoning ( chili flakes, oregano, italiano, salt and parmesan) and simmer for 10 minutes.
Add in cooked rotini, ravioli and handful of spinach and heat through until spinach is wilted

title: Cauliflower and Yam taco with Chipotle Cream sauce

steps.text: Peel and cube yam; soak in water for about 10 minutes to remove starch and then towel dry
wash and dry cauliflower and then cut florets into bite size pieces
toss yam and cauliflower separately in 1 tbsp oil, 0.5 tsp of each ground spices, 0.5tsp of salt and place on lined baking sheet and bake at 425F for 22 minutes and then  broil for about 2 minutes
blend all sauce ingredients (yogurt, mayo, chipotle pepper, garlic clove, lime juice, 1 tsp olive oil, maple syrup and salt to taste) in blender until smooth
Serve yam and cauliflower with drizzled chipotle sauce on warmed tortilla with: cheese, black beans, shredded lettuce, tomato, salsa - lots of options!

Heat the oil in a 12-inch heavy-bottomed sauté pan or medium-sized Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Once hot, add the cumin and coriander seeds for about 1 minute, tossing frequently, or until aromatic and darker by a few shades but don’t let them burn! Add the curry leaves and cook for 30 seconds

Add the onions with a big pinch of salt and cook for 5 minutes, until starting to get some color. If the spices start to darken, lower the heat to medium. Add a splash of water as needed to prevent onions from browning.
Add garlic and ginger, and cook for 1 to 2 minutes, stirring frequently.
Add Ground Spices and tomato paste and stir frequently for 90 seconds. If it dries out, add a splash of water.
Add tomatoes + 2 teaspoons kosher salt. Use tomato juices to scrape up browned bits. Cook for 5 minutes, or until tomatoes are soft and the oil starts to release from them.
blend curry base using an immersion blender.
Pour in chickpeas, coconut milk, water, tahini, and sugar. Stir well and bring to a simmer. Cover and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes, opening the pot to stir occasionally.
After the simmer time, add the greens. Simmer until tender and wilted, 4 to 5 minutes. Stir in the garam masala to combine.
Off the heat, squeeze in a little lemon or lime juice and cilantro. Season to taste with salt (about ½ teaspoon kosher salt).
whisk dry ingredients together

beat eggs and add melted butter, sugar, milk and vanilla extract and whisk well (important to incorporate the eggs and melted butter together well and gradually whisk the milk in to avoid separation of the butter fat solids)
gently fold in dry into wet and add blueberries to incorporate
cook on medium heat with some butter
Chop onions, bell pepper and tomatoes. Mince garlic finely. Drain beans and corn.

To a pan, heat oil and stir fry onion and garlic; add the sausages (chopped and skin removed) and stir fry for a few minutes. Add bell pepper and cook until vegetables are softened and sausage is cooked. Add spices (chilli powder, cumin, paprika, and chipotle pepper adobo sauce) and drained beans and corn and mix throughout
In a separate pan, scramble eggs until barely cooked and then transfer eggs into the wok of veggies/ sausage. At this point, add the diced tomatoes and mix. Taste and season with salt as necessary.

To assemble: place some enchilada sauce at the bottom of an oven proof pan. For each enchilada: place a few tbsp of sauce on the tortilla to moisten and then add filling and top with some cheese. Roll up the enchilada and place in the pan with the fold side down. Repeat until all are assembled, top with the last of enchilada sauce and then cheese.
Bake uncovered at 350F for 20 minutes followed by a 2-5 minute broil
Quinoa: rinse and cook in an instant pot with 1.5 cups of water for 3 minutes on high pressure with 10 minutes of natural release. Fluff and set aside
Tomatoes: Mix whole cherry tomatoes with olive oil and salt and then cook in air fryer at 390F for 15 minutes
Vegetables: de-seed the cucumber and dice all veggies into small pieces
Dressing: mince the garlic and mix all components until well combined
Assemble: add all components to a large bowl , add in dressing then mix to combine.
Preheat the oven to 350°F and line a cupcake/muffin pan with cupcake liners.
In a medium bowl, whisk together 1 1/4 cups flour, 1 1/4 tsp baking powder, and 1/2 tsp salt. Set flour mix aside.
In the bowl of an electric mixer, beat butter and sugar on medium-high speed 5 minutes until thick and fluffy, scraping down the bowl as needed.
Add eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition then scrape down the bowl. Add 2 tsp vanilla and beat to combine.

Reduce mixer speed to medium and add the flour mixture in thirds alternating with the buttermilk, mixing to incorporate with each addition. Scrape down the bowl as needed and beat until just combined and smooth, and don't overmix. Add crushed oreos and stir to combine
Divide batter into mini cupcake tins and bake between 9-15 minutes

prepare icing: beat butter on high speed for 5 minutes or until lightened in color and whipped, scraping down the bowl as needed, sift in powdered sugar while beating at medium-low speed, add vanilla extract and 1/3 cup of crushed oreo, add milk as needed to desired consistency
pipe each mini cupcake with some frosting and top each one with a mini oreo
dice all veggies
sauté garlic in oil in the instantpot, add all the other veggies (except cherry tomato) and cook until softened
add water to deglaze, add soy sauce and Italian seasoning and mix everything
on top: add tomato sauce and cherry tomato and DO NOT MIX
cook at high pressure for 10 minutes with 10 mins natural release
Add prepared pasta and stir to combine. Add about 1/4 cup grated parmesan
Dry Fish with paper towel to remove moisture then cut into chunks
Mix marinade ingredients (paprika, garam masala, turmeric, ginger/garlic, lemon juice, greek yogurt and salt) . Coat fish chunks in marinade then put in fridge for 15 minutes
Make gravy by putting instant pot on sauté mode and cook whole cumin with butter. Add onions and ginger/garlic and fry until softened
add tomatoes and all spices (except for fenugreek) and 0.5 cup of water.
cook in instant pot at high pressure for 5 minutes with 5 mins natural release
blend the gravy with a hand blender and add in the cream and fenugreek
Make fish by cooking in air fryer (lined with aluminum foil) for 8 mins at 390F
Mix the fish into the gravy , add cilantro and stir to combine
Chop veggies into cubes, mince garlic
Dissolve bean paste into the water in a medium-large pot. Add all ingredients (except the shrimp) into the pot and bring to a boil then cook at medium-low heat for 15-20 minutes
Add in shrimp and let cook until shrimp is cooked (3 minutes)

Roast Beets: Wash beets and cut off top and bottom then slice beets in half. Toss in some olive oil and salt and then lay out beets on a large piece of parchment paper and wrap in foil. Bake in preheated oven at 375F for 1 hour or until beets are tender. Once cooled, rub off the skin of beets using a paper towel or under cold water with gloves. Slice beets into pieces
prepare dressing: Whisk together apple cider vinegar, mustard and some salt and then drizzle in olive oil while whisking well.
To the greens in a bowl: crumble goat cheese, add in beets and toasted walnuts and then toss with your dressing
Cut tenderloin lengthwise into two halves
Combine the sugar, salt, five spice powder, white pepper, sesame oil, wine, soy sauce, hoisin sauce, molasses, food coloring (if using), and garlic in a bowl to make the marinade (i.e. the BBQ sauce)

Reserve about 2 tablespoons of marinade and set it aside. Rub the pork with the rest of the marinade in a large bowl or baking dish. Cover and refrigerate overnight, or at least 8 hours. Cover and store the reserved marinade in the fridge as well.

Line a sheet pan with foil and place a metal rack on top. Using the metal rack keeps the pork off of the pan.Place the pork on the rack, leaving as much space as possible between pieces. Pour 1 ½ cups water into the pan below the rack. This prevents any drippings from burning or smoking.

Preheat oven to 450F. combine the reserved marinade with the maltose or honey (maltose is very viscous––you can heat it up in the microwave to make it easier to work with) and 1 tablespoon hot water. This will be the sauce you’ll use for basting the pork.
Bake for 20minutes initially, Flip and baste with marinade - rotate tray
Bake at 375F for 10 Minutes. Flip and baste with marinade
bake at 375 for 7 minutes . Baste again
Finish by broiling for 3 minutes on each side at top rack
Remove from the oven and baste with the last bit of reserved BBQ sauce. Let the meat rest for 10 minutes before slicing, and enjoy!
place all ingredients into the instant pot and cook at high for 45 minutes with 15 minute natural release
shred pork using fork and place on baking sheet (lined with aluminum)
put some marinade on the pork and salt in necessary
broil at high for 5 minutes (or until crispy)
Serve as: tacos (tortilla, cilantro, cheese and pickled onions) , in burritos or even on a pizza with hot banana peppers
The night before, soak the dried chickpeas in water. Make sure the water covers the chickpeas by 2 to 3 inches, as they'll triple in size.
Drain and rinse the chickpeas and add them to your food processor, along with the onion, parsley, cilantro, pepper, garlic, cumin, salt, cardamom and black pepper.
Pulse the food processor several times until the mixture resembles the texture of coarse sand
Transfer the falafel mixture to a bowl and add the flour and baking soda. Stir together, then cover or add a lid and refrigerate the mixture for 30 minutes to one hour.
form falafel balls. (at this point - if not cooking right away, can transfer the falafel mixture into a ziplock bag to freeze)
Spray with oil and air fry at 350F for 14 minutes (flipping half way through)

title: Curried Lentil Shepard's Pie

steps.text: Potatoes (instant pot)
Place peeled and sliced potatoes into the bottom of the instant pot. Cover with 3 cups of water and cook on manual pressure for 8 minutes with quick release
Drain potatoes and return to instant pot. Add the remainder of ingredients (adding in the milk as needed) and mash. Set aside
Fillng
Set lentils to cook in (unless cooked already – and you could absolutely do this ahead) about 20-25 minutes (place in pot with 4 cups of broth) simmer until tender, but not falling apart, al dente.

In a large pot, heat the butter over medium high heat and saute the onion 2-3 minutes, lower heat to med, add garlic, saute 2 minutes, add veggie grounds, carrots and mushrooms and  cook 5-7 minutes. Add salt, cumin, coriander, fenugreek leaves, curry powder and garam masala.

Add broth. Bring to a simmer, cover and simmer on med low, until carrots are cooked through about 7-8 minutes.

MAKE THE GRAVY: Over medium heat, in a little pot, simmer the whole seeds ( cumin seeds and fennel seeds)  in ghee or oil until fragrant and golden. Add flour, whisking, stirring and toasting the flour one minute. Gradually whisk in the warm veggie broth. Cook until slightly thickened. Add this gravy to the filling, along with the peas, corn and drained lentils. Mix to combine

The filling should have  thick stew-like, saucy consistency. If too dry, add a splash of broth or water. If too watery, simmer off some of that liquid. If the filling is too watery, the mashed potatoes will sink.
Assembly
Assemble: In a large oven proof dish, place all the filling in and spread to flatten. Then add mashed potatoes (big dallops at a time on top and spread out with the back of a spoon.
Place in the oven at 350F until golden and bubbling, about 20-25 minutes. Feel free to brown the top under a broiler.

notes: - makes 8 medium size servings or 6 very large servings

steps.text: Slice all vegetables into thin strips and chop kimchi with scissors
In a large bowl, mix in the flour (or pancake mix), kimchi liquid, egg and water until just combined. HINT: use icy cold water
Add in the vegetables and kimchi
Add a little more water if the batter is too thick. The batter should flow easily from a spoon.

Heat one tablespoon of oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat. Ladle the mixture into the pan, and spread it evenly into a thin round shape. Cook until the edges turn light golden brown, about 3 minutes. Turn it over, and add more oil to the sides of the pan. Gently swirl the pan to distribute the oil under the pancakes. Press the pancake down with a spatula. Cook until the other side is nicely browned and crispy, 2 to 3 minutes.
Dice onion, mushroom, onion and garlic clove super finely. Shred the zucchini with a cheese grater
Salt the zucchini and cabbage lightly with salt and leave for 30 mins to the side. Squeeze out the water from the vegetables afterwards and throw away the salted water
Crumble the tofu and remove any excess water. Mix in 1 tsp of chicken powder and 1 tsp of sesame oil
Mix all the veggies with the following: ground pork, tofu mixture, 1 egg, soy sauce, sesame oil and ginger
Microwave a little bit of the mixture to test seasoning (About 30 seconds). Add salt as necessary

Assemble the dumplings. At this point, can freeze by placing the uncooked dumplings on a plate that is lined with parchment paper and placing in the freezer for about 30 mins (Ensure the dumplings aren’t touching each other as they can stick together)

To cook: heat oil on a frying pan on medium heat, place dumplings down and let fry for about 2 mins, then add ⅓ cup of water to the pan, cover with a lid and simmer for about 5 mins. Remove the lid and let the rest of the water evaporate.

ingredients.element: Kashmiri red chili powder or any other mild red chili powder

steps.text: Pat dry the chicken drumsticks with a paper towel.
Make 3-4 slits across the thick part on each drumstick.

Make marinade by combining yogurt, ginger, garlic, red chili powder, turmeric, garam masala, and salt. Place the dried fenugreek leaves on the palm of your hands and gently crush them rubbing the hands together.
Add chicken to the marinade. Add lemon juice and mix everything coating the chicken with the marinade
Allow the chicken to marinate for at least 20 minutes or you can also marinate in the refrigerator for up to 24 hours.
Line air fryer with a sheet of aluminum foil with raised edges so the juices don't drip- spray foil with oil.  Line the marinated chicken in the basket and spray with oil.
Air fry at 350°F for 15 minutes. Shake the basket halfway and lightly spray with oil.

Once the cooking cycle is completed check the internal temperature of the thickest piece and make sure it's at 165°F. You may continue to cook the chicken or add 1 to 2 minutes for charred marks but make sure not to overcook
Serve with lentil Dal, rice or naan

ingredients.element: medium carrots, julienned (or 1/2-inch thick long strips)

steps.text: Cook the rice using a little less water than usual. (Freshly cooked rice is best for gimbap.) While the rice is still hot/warm, add the sesame oil and salt. Mix well by lightly folding with a rice paddle or large spoon until evenly seasoned. Add more salt to taste if needed. Keep the rice warm until ready to use
Cook ground beef in frying  pan, remove most of the oil. Add the seasonings (sesame oil, dark soy sauce) and mix to combine

Bring a large pot of water to a boil over high heat and prepare a cold water bath. Blanch the spinach, place immediately in cold water, then squeeze out excess water. Season with the sesame oil and salt.

Crack and beat the eggs, in a bowl with a spoon or a fork. Stir in a pinch of salt. Heat a small non-stick pan over medium-low heat. Add the eggs to the pan and cook as an omelet. transfer egg to cutting board and cut lengthwise into 1/2-inch thick strips.
Julienne the carrots. Heat a lightly oiled pan over medium-high heat. Stir-fry the carrots until softened (can add water to soften). Lightly season with a pinch of salt. Transfer to a plate
Wrap your bamboo sheet (for folding) in a couple layers of plastic wrap so that it stays clean. Grab a set of plastic cloves for grabbing the ingredients.
Put a seaweed sheet, shiny side down and longer side towards you, on a bamboo mat. Spread about 0.5 cup of rice on seaweed, leaving about 1.5 inch space at the top.
Lay the prepared ingredients on top of the rice, leaving some uncovered rice at the top for sealing.

Lift the entire bottom edge with both hands and roll over the filling away from you, tucking in the filling with your fingers. Put firm pressure over the roll with the help of the bamboo mat to close everything in tightly. Then, continue to roll again, putting pressure evenly over the roll using both hands.

Rub or brush the roll with a little bit of sesame oil for extra flavor and shiny look. Apply a little bit of sesame oil to a sharp knife. (This will keep rice from sticking to the knife. Repeat as necessary after each cut. Wipe the knife with a damp towel as needed.) Cut the roll into 1/2-inch thick bite sizes.

ingredients.fdcQuery: Peanut butter, smooth style, without salt

steps.text: In a small sauce pan, add the coconut cream and heat over Medium heat until slightly simmering.
Add the red curry paste and whisk to combine.
When fully incorporated, add the lime juice, fish sauce, and sugar. Cook until incorporated.
Add the peanut butter last and whisk to combine, lower heat to low and cover, whisking occasionally to keep from separating.
In a large wok, heat peanut oil over Medium High heat until shimmering.
Stir fry the garlic and onion until softened and then add shrimp and snow peas until cooked
Add broccoli and carrots (if using) to a pot of simmering water and blanch until wilted, about 1 to 2 minutes. Drain the veggies
Add cooked veggies to the wok of shrimp, onion and garlic. Pour in the peanut sauce and stir to combine everything
Serve over a bed of rice

ingredients.fdcQuery: Chicken, roasting, meat and skin, cooked, roasted

steps.text: Make Chicken stock: strip meat off of chicken and place all the bones and skin into an instant pot along with optional (1 carrot, 1 onion, 2 stalks of celery) , 3 bay leaves and 10 cups of water. Cook on high pressure for 1 hour with 30 mins natural release. Drain out all the bits and now you have chicken stock
Shred the chicken meat and set aside
chop all veggies into medium pieces , mince garlic finely
chop bacon into small pieces
In instant pot, add chopped bacon and cook until fat has rendered off, remove about half of the fat
To instant pot with bacon, saute all vegetables (Except frozen peas) with butter until softened.
Add in chicken broth (should be about 8 cups) along with: 6 bay leaves and knox cubes.
Cook on high pressure for about 20 mins with 15 minute natural release
Open instant pot and skim off excess fat as desired and remove bay leaves.
Add in shredded chicken and the following seasoning: worcheshire sauce, vinegar, basil, (oregano- optional) and salt to taste (usually at least 1 tsp)
Set instant pot to saute , add in frozen peas and desired pasta and cook until pasta is done (pasta will continue to cook in the instant pot so don't overcook)
Serve!

ingredients.fdcQuery: Chickpeas (garbanzo beans, bengal gram), mature seeds, canned, drained, rinsed in tap water
Salad dressing, KRAFT Mayo Light Mayonnaise
Tortillas, ready-to-bake or -fry, flour, shelf stable
Cheese, cheddar (Includes foods for USDA's Food Distribution Program)

steps.text: Drain and rinse the chickpeas, then put them on a plate and microwave for 3 minutes on high to get rid of excess moisture and soften
Add chickpeas to a bowl with the mayonnaise, sriracha, cilantro, lemon juice, and salt. (You may want to start with less sriracha and add more to taste if you are sensitive to heat).
Mash the chickpeas until they are fairly broken down and the dressing ingredients have combined.
To assemble the wrap: put down a tortilla (microwave for 20 sec. To soften) and put down 1 handful of spinach, 1/3 of chickpea , shredded carrot, cheese and anything else of your choice .
Tightly wrap and cut in half to enjoy

title: Shrimp Rice Wraps

ingredients.fdcQuery: Onions, spring or scallions (includes tops and bulb), raw

steps.text: Cook the shrimp by defrosting and then removing the shell. In a frying pan, cook the shrimp with some oil, salt, and garlic powder (optional: can add some chili oil or red pepper flakes). Cut shrimp in halfway lengthwise.
Prep all the veggies by thinly slicing into strips
Prep noodles by cooking in boiling water for 1 -2 minutes and then quickly rinsing with cold water, squeeze out the water and set aside

To assemble: cover each rice wrap in water briefly to soften and place on a wooden board. In the middle of the wrapper, lay down some noodles, veggies , 3-4 pieces of shrimp and lastly cilantro. Fold the bottom half of the wrap upwards until it covers all the filling, fold in the sides so that all the filling is enclosed and then finish by rolling the wrap upwards.
Serve with Hoisin or delicious peanut sauce (eric's choice!)

notes:
Best eaten fresh; can prep the fillings and make as needed 
Can sub shrimp for: tofu (vegetarian), pork or chicken

steps.text: Mince raw shrimp very finely
Mix all filling ingredients very well by hand
make wontons by filling each wrapper with about 1 tbsp of filing , folding the wonton wrapper so that you form a triangle, bring the 2 side corners together in the middle and pressing together
mix all sauce ingredients (5 tbsp soy sauce, 2.5 tbsp of sesame oil, 4 tbsp sugar) together
Slice beef very thinly and then cook in wok very lightly with a couple spoons of prepared sauce. Remove from heat
slice all the veggies (onion, carrot, bell pepper, and mushroom) into thin pieces - then sauté them with a little bit of oil and some water until softened. Remove from heat

blanch washed spinach in boiling water for 1 minute , remove and rinse with cold water and then squeeze out the excess water. Mix spinach with the rest of sesame oil, some salt and sesame seeds. Set aside
Cook noodles according to instructions then drain
In a large wok, stir fry the noodles with the rest of sauce and oil and then add to a large mixing bowl.
To same mixing bowl, add all the cooked veggies and meat then stir to combine with gloves and top with sesame seeds
Boil noodles according to package instructions (al dente as you will be stir frying them later)
Heat half of the oil in a wok and add the grown meat and cook until mostly browned - add some salt and a splash of the sauce
Add onion, garlic and mushroom and cook for a couple minutes. Add the bokchoy, green onion and shrimp  and cook until veggies are wilted. Remove this mixture from the wok
Heat rest of the oil in the wok and then at high heat, stir fry the noodles along with all of the sauce until well incorporated
To the wok of noodles, add back in all the cooked veggies and meat and stir to combine
top each serving with more black vinegar as desired.

Combine beef stock , garlic, chipotles, onion, green chilis, lime juice, vinegar, cumin, oregano, salt, pepper and cloves in a blender or food processor.  Purée for 30 seconds, or until completely smooth.  Set aside
cut beef into chunks and then sear on instant pot in sauté mode for 45 seconds each side until browned.
add some of pureed sauce to deglaze. Then add all of the sauce and bay leaf and toss to combine
pressure cook at high pressure for 60 minutes followed by quick release
shred beef. Serve in either: taco form (with cheese, sautéed veggies or pickled red onions, cilantro and sliced avocado) or bowl form (fresh rice, refried beans, veggies and fresh salsa)
mix dry ingredients together (flour, baking powder, sugar, cocoa powder) in small bowl
Beat egg whites with milk and apple sauce in a separate bowl
stir wet and dry together lightly and then pour into a MUG that has been greased with a bit of cooking spray. Top with chocolate chips
Microwave for 50 seconds
let cool for a couple minutes and serve with fruit and cool whip
Sauce

Prepare sauce packet according to instructions: Combine sauce mix, milk, half-and-half and 2 tbsp of butter into a medium saucepan and bring to boil over medium heat, stirring constantly. Reduce heat and simmer for 3 minutes
Add 1 cup of tomato sauce to the Alfredo mix, and stir in parmesan cheese. Mix until combined and set aside
Pasta
In a large saucepan, heat olive oil with onion and garlic and cook for a few minutes.
Add in other veggies (mushroom and zucchini) and cook until softened.
Near the end, add in shrimp and cook until heated through.
Boil pasta (can use either the whole rotini box or half rotini/ half tortellini)
Add pasta to the pot of veggies/ shrimp and then add in the sauce and stir through to combine

ingredients.element: chole masala (spice mix that is yellow)

steps.text: Soak dry chickpeas overnight (or for at least 6+ hours) in 3 cups of water and set aside
Start instantpot in saute mode. Add oil, cumin seeds, bay leaves, ginger and garlic and then toast
add onions and saute for 3 minutes
Add tomato and all ground spices (except dry mango powder)
Drain chickpea soaking water, add chickpeas to instant pot along with 1.5 cups of water and then cook on high pressure for 35 mins with full natural release
Add dried feugreek and dry mango powder. place on saute mode and boil for about 2 minutes. May smash a bit for thicker gravy
add sugar and cream. top with cilantro

title: Spaghetti squash with Pesto Rice and Sausage

steps.text: prepare spaghetti squash: cut in half and scoop out seeds. In an instant pot, place trivet and pour in 1 cup of water. Place squash halves in the instant pot and cook on high pressure for 8 minutes
Chop veggies (mushrooms, onion and tomato), mince garlic and cut sausage into bite sized pieces
In deep pan, add sausage to brown and add onion, garlic, mushroom and tomatoes and cook until softened, add rice, and pesto and stir until all well combined
Stuff prepared spaghetti squash with half of the rice/ sausage mixture and top with shredded cheese
Place halves on aluminum lined baking tray and bake at 375F for 25 minutes
Shred zucchini and cook with oats and water in a medium saucepan for 5 minutes on a medium boil
add mlk and mix until thick
add egg whites and keep mixing until fluffy (1 minute)
Add sweetener of choice (1 tbsp of sugar or 2 tsp of splenda) ,  peanut butter powder and cocoa powder
mix until combined and  top with maple syrup, walnuts and almond butter
combine salad dressing components (except the cucumber and chopped cilantro) and set aside
roughly cut cucumber (cut in half first) then diagonally into bite sized pieces and then smash those pieces
toss everything to combine
Mix all contents of sauce together - adjust salt to taste
dry salmon with paper towel
Place sauce on the SKIN side of the salmon and then place the salmon on a piece of parchment paper in airfryer
cook in air fryer for 390F for 8 mins
Peel potatoes and dice. Chop all veggies (broccoli florets, carrot and onion) and mince garlic cloves

Can either: sauté garlic, onion and carrot in butter in the instant pot, then deglaze, followed by adding in all other ingredients (except cheese and milk) OR if short on time, just dump in all ingredients (except milk and cheese) into the instant pot and mix to combine
Cook at HIGH pressure for 5 mins followed by 10 minutes of natural release
add in milk then blend with hand blender
Stir in cheese in handfuls.
Dice and steam the cauliflower and carrot until softened. Set aside
In a large wok, heat oil and then add the aromatics (minced garlic and ginger) , curry paste and spices (garam massala, cumin, turmeric and coriander) and diced onion and heat through.
Add the rest of the veggies (mushroom, zucchini) and cook until slightly softened - should still have a bite to them
Add in the coconut milk and diced tofu and then stir to combine. Simmer for 10 minutes until tofu and veggies are cooked
Add in cauliflower and carrots and then stir to combine. Serve on top of rice

title: Kale Caesar Salad with Parmesan Chickpeas Sweet Potatoes

steps.text: Sweet Potatoes: peel and dice sweet potatoes , soak in water for about 10 minutes - combine with 1 tbsp of olive oil, 1 tsp chili powder , 1 tsp paprika and salt.Toss well to evenly coat. Transfer to the oven and roast for 20 minutes.
Kale: wash and massage kale with some salt, the lemon juice and olive oil.
chickpeas: toss chickpeas with oil and seasoning then pan fry them until heated and crispy.
Dressing:Combine all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. Taste and adjust the salt and pepper.
Toss the roasted sweet potatoes and chickpeas in with the salad. Add the dressing and toss to combine.
In a large bowl, combine flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, salt, and sugar. In a separate bowl grate zucchini and squeeze any excess water out.
In a separate bowl, beat together eggs, bananas, oil, and vanilla extract.
combine wet into dry
Fold in grated zucchini and chocolate chips.
Pour batter into a well-oiled loaf pan.
Bake at 350°F for about 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
Shred zucchini and cook with oats and water in a medium saucepan for 5 minutes on a medium boil
add mlk and mix until thick
add egg whites and keep mixing until fluffy (1 minute)
add half of banana (mashed), sweetener of choice (1 tbsp of sugar or 2 tsp of splenda) , cinnamon and peanut butter powder
mix until combined and  top with blueberries and peanut butter or more sliced banana (optional)
Sauce: blend all ingredients together and set aside
Vegetables: shred carrot and beets finely
sweet potato: peel and cube into small pieces - coat with olive oil and salt and then air fry or bake in oven until done
rice: cook as per usual but add 1 tsp of turmeric powder into the cooking water for a nice yellow colour
Cookies
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F

Beat butter and white sugar together in a medium bowl until creamy. Mix in 0.25 teaspoon almond extract. Add flour and (optional - add toasted coconut) mix until dough comes together. OPTIONAL: at this point, chill the dough
Form dough into 1 1/2-inch balls and place on ungreased cookie sheets about 2 inches apart. Use your thumb to press down and make a dent in the center of each ball, then fill with jam.
Bake in batches the preheated oven until edges are lightly browned, about 14 to 18 minutes; allow to cool on cookie sheet for a few minutes.
Glaze
Mix confectioners' sugar, milk, and remaining 0.25 teaspoon almond extract together in a medium bowl until smooth; drizzle lightly over warm cookies.
Cook corn in Instant Pot: pour 1 cup of water into the instant pot, place trivet in and place corn on top. Cook corn on high pressure for 1-2 minutes with quick release
Drain the corn and cool completely. Use a sharp knife to remove the kernels from the corn cob.
In a large bowl, combine the corn kernels, cherry tomatoes, diced cucumbers, and red onion.
Drizzle the olive oil and apple cider vinegar over the salad. Crumble feta in.
Season generously with salt & pepper to taste and toss well to combine.
Just before serving, sprinkle with fresh herbs toss to combine
Peel and cut potatoes into about 1-inch cubes. Cut the carrot, peppers, and onion into big chunks.
In a small bowl, combine all the braising liquid ingredients except the sesame oil and seeds. Stir well.
In a non-stick pan (or a small pot), sauté the potatoes in cooking oil over medium heat for 4 - 5 minutes, stirring occasionally so the potatoes don't stick to the pan.

Add the sauce mix and bring it to a boil over high heat. Drop the carrot pieces in. Cover, and reduce the heat to medium and cook until the potatoes are almost cooked through (about 5 to 6 minutes, depending on the type or size of potatoes). The potatoes should be firm and not mushy.

Stir in the green peppers and onion, and continue to boil (uncover this time) until the sauce is reduced and slightly thickened, about 3 minutes. The potatoes will continue to soak up the sauce even after being cooked. Stir in the sesame oil and sprinkle with sesame seeds.

ingredients.fdcQuery: Chicken, broilers or fryers, dark meat, thigh, meat only, raw

ingredients.element: dashi (Japanese soup stock) (use standard Awase Dashi, dashi packet or powder, or Vegan Dashi)

ingredients.fdcQuery: Onions, spring or scallions (includes tops and bulb), raw

steps.text: Cooking Chicken: pound meat until evenly thin and then salt each side lightly. Dredge each piece in the following order: flour, beaten egg, panko bread crumbs. Spray the top side with oil and then Airfry at 375F for : 10 minutes + flip/ spray for 7minutes (for thigh ) OR 6 minutes + flip/spray for 3 minutes (breast)
Combine 0.5 cup dashi (Japanese soup stock), 2 Tbsp soy sauce, 2 Tbsp mirin, and 2 tsp sugar in a bowl or a liquid measuring cup and mix all together until the sugar is dissolved.
Slice onion thinly, add the sliced onions to a medium frying pan (heat off) in a single layer. Then, add the seasonings mixture. It should just cover the onions.
Turn on the heat to medium and bring it to a simmer. Cook, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until onions are tender.
Add your chicken katsu into the pan
Add your 4 eggs (whisked) into the pan and cook until the eg is JUST set (don't want to overcook)

Portion 2 servings of cooked Japanese short-grain rice into individual donburi or other serving bowls. Slide the cooked chicken and egg mixture onto the steamed rice and drizzle the desired amount of pan sauce on top.
Add chopped green scallion on top and enjoy

title: Poached Egg , Avocado, Roasted Tomato Toast

ingredients.fdcQuery: Tomatoes, red, ripe, raw, year round average

steps.text: Cherry tomatoes: toss whole cherry tomatoes in salt and olive oil and then air fry for 10 minutes on lined parchment paper until burst
Guacamole: mash avocado and mix with some lime juice, salt and garlic powder to taste

Poach eggs: fill wok with water (about 1/3 full) and boil, reduce to simmer and add some vinegar. Gently lower in eggs using a 1/3 measuring cup, let cook for 5 mins and then remove eggs and place in cold water
Assemble: toast sourdough bread, spread guacamole, top with cherry tomatoes and then egg. Sprinkle on top with some feta (optional) or salt

ingredients.fdcQuery: Onions, spring or scallions (includes tops and bulb), raw

steps.text: Soak the rice cakes for about 20 minutes (can be longer for refrigerated rice cakes).
Cut the fish cake, cabbage, and scallions into about 2-inch long pieces.

To a large pan, add the dried anchovies with 6 cups of water. Bring it to a boil over medium high heat, and continue to boil for 10 minutes. Reduce it close to medium if your heat is very high. Drain out the anchovies.

Make boiled eggs: add eggs to a pot with another water to cover the eggs fully. Put lid on the pot and set heat to high until water boils, immediately reduce heat to medium (5) and set timer for 5 minutes. Immediately remove from heat and cover the eggs with cold water.
Measure out about 4 cups of broth into a large saucepan, Add the sauce ingredients to the pan, stirring to dissolve the red chili pepper paste (gochujang).

Add the rice cakes. Boil until the rice cakes become very soft and the sauce is thickened, about 8 - 10 minutes. This can take longer, depending on your rice cakes. Stir frequently so the rice cakes don't stick to the bottom of the pan.

Drop the vegetables, garlic, and fish cakes in. Continue to boil, stirring occasionally, for an additional 4 - 6 minutes. Depending on rice cakes, you may need more time to reach a desired level of softness. Add more broth or water as necessary.
Drop in the scallions and ramen noodles with 2 to 3 minutes remaining. Taste the sauce, and adjust the seasoning if needed. Serve hot, topped with a boiled egg

title: THE Cookie (NYT Salted Chocolate Chip Shortbread Cookie)

ingredients.fdcQuery: Eggs, Grade A, Large, egg white

steps.text: Using a stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment or an electric hand mixer, beat the butter, both sugars and vanilla on medium-high till it’s super light and fluffy (3 to 5 minutes for a stand mixer; 6 to 8 for a hand mixer).

Using a spatula, scrape down the sides of the bowl and, with the mixer on low, slowly add the flour, followed by the chocolate chunks, and mix just to blend. If necessary, knead the dough with your hands to make sure the flour is totally incorporated. At this point, the dough should be smooth and feel like Play-Doh with no pockets of flour.

Divide the dough in half, placing each half on a large piece of plastic wrap. Fold the plastic over so that it covers the dough to protect your hands from getting all sticky. Using your hands, form the dough into a log shape; rolling it on the counter will help you smooth it out, but don’t worry about getting it totally perfect. Chill until totally firm, about 2 hours.
Heat the oven to 350C
Brush the outside of the logs with the beaten egg and roll them in the 1 Tbsp sugar (this is for those really delicious, crisp edges).

Using a serrated knife, carefully slice each log into ½-inch-thick rounds (if you hit a chocolate chunk, slowly saw back and forth through the chocolate). If the cookies break or fall apart, just press them back together — the dough is very forgiving. Place them on the prepared baking sheets about 1 inch apart (they won’t spread much). Sprinkle with flaky salt. Bake until the edges are just beginning to brown (12 Minutes)
Let cool on cooking wire and serve

title: World Peace Cookies (Double Chocolate Shortbread Cookies)

ingredients.fdcQuery: Cocoa, dry powder, unsweetened, HERSHEY'S European Style Cocoa

ingredients.element: bittersweet dark chocolate and white chocolate mix

steps.text: Sift the flour, cocoa and baking soda together.

Working with a stand mixer, preferably fitted with a paddle attachment, or with a hand mixer in a large bowl, beat the butter on medium speed until soft and creamy. Add both sugars, the salt and vanilla extract and beat for 2 minutes more.

Turn off the mixer. Pour in HALF the dry ingredients, drape a kitchen towel over the stand mixer to protect yourself and your kitchen from flying flour and pulse the mixer at low speed about 5 times, a second or two each time. Repeat with rest of the dry ingredients.

Take a peek — if there is still a lot of flour on the surface of the dough, pulse a couple of times more; if not, remove the towel. Continuing at low speed, mix for about 30 seconds more, just until the flour disappears into the dough — for the best texture, work the dough as little as possible once the flour is added, and don't be concerned if the dough looks a little crumbly. Toss in the chocolate pieces and mix only to incorporate.

Turn the dough out onto a work surface, gather it together and divide it in half. Working with one half at a time, shape the dough into logs that are 1 1/2 inches in diameter. Wrap the logs in plastic wrap and refrigerate them for at least 3 hours. (The dough can be refrigerated for up to 3 days or frozen for up to 2 months. If you've frozen the dough, you needn't defrost it before baking — let it warm just enough so that you can slice the log into rounds and bake the cookies 1 minute longer.)
Center a rack in the oven and preheat the oven to 325 °F. Line two baking sheets with parchment or silicone mats.

Using a sharp thin knife, slice the logs into rounds that are 1/2 inch thick. (The rounds are likely to crack as you're cutting them — don't be concerned, just squeeze the bits back onto each cookie.) Arrange the rounds on the baking sheets, leaving about 1 inch between them.

Bake the cookies one sheet at a time for 12 minutes — they won't look done, nor will they be firm, but that's just the way they should be. Transfer the baking sheet to a cooling rack and let the cookies rest until they are only just warm, at which point you can serve them or let them reach room temperature.

ingredients.fdcQuery: Tomatoes, red, ripe, raw, year round average

steps.text: Dice all veggies into small pieces
Mince garlic and cilantro very finely
Mix all ingredients together - adjust salt to taste

title: Breakfast Cheese Egg Toast

ingredients.element: Cheese slice (mozzarella, monetary or other good melting type)

steps.text: Toast bread and on each slice, spread 1 tsp of siracha onto the toast and place 1 slice (or serving) of cheese on and air fry on "broil" mode for about 2-3 minutes
Fry 2 eggs - sunny side up to desired runniness
Prep avocado by making into guacamole - mash with fork and add lime juice, salt and garlic powder to taste
To assemble: on cheese toast - top with fried egg , guacamole and salsa as desired.
Eat with fork and knife

notes:
Can try the following combos: 
- pizza sauce/mozzarella/egg
- pesto/ sharp cheese/ egg

title: Kale Chickpea Sweet Potato Caesar Wrap
Green chicken curry

steps.text: Choose your chicken - we've used bone on/ skin on chicken thigh, skinless/boneless chicken thigh and also frozen chicken breast. IF using frozen chicken breast - adjust time cooked for 15 minutes high pressure (instead of 8 minutes)
Prepare Pressure Cooker:  press Sauté button on instant pot - wait until indicator says HOT

Sauté Thai Green Curry Paste: Add 1 tbsp of oil and 3 tbsp Thai green curry paste into the pressure cooker. Sauté for 30 seconds until fragrant. Add chopped onions, garlic, ginger and lemon grass into the pressure cooker and sauté for another 1 ½ minute.
Deglaze Pot: Pour coconut milk into the pressure cooker and fully deglaze the pot with a wooden spoon. Add in 1.5 Tbsp fish sauce and 2 tbsp sugar
Add the chicken into the pressure cooker along with all your hard veggies (kabocha/ butternut squash, potatoes and carrots)
Close the lid and pressure cook at High Pressure for 8 minutes (if using chicken thigh) + 10 minutes Natural Release.
In a wok, cook the soft veggies with some water (broccoli and bell pepper and shrimp if using)
Once the pressure cooker is  done, open the lid and set the chicken pieces aside in a large serving bowl - can shred the chicken breast/ thigh and remove skin and bones if there is any

Add all the meat back to the instant pot curry along with the cooked vegetables from the wok - mix until well incorporated and taste for seasoning (may have to add sugar or fish sauce depending on preferred taste)
Serve over jasmine rice

notes:
VERY versatile - the only thing that is constant is the acount of curry paste, aromatics and the can of coconut milk. Can use any meat or protein (can use extra firm tofu that has been cubed and added in with the chicken to the instant pot) and any veggies (just cook depending on hardness of the veggie) 
Can adjust spice by adding in some dry red chillies

steps.text: Heat a teaspoon of oil in a wok over medium heat and add 0.25 cup raw peanuts. Stir constantly (or they’ll burn) for 3 minutes. Turn off the heat and stir for another minute using the residual heat in the wok. Set aside to cool. They will turn crunchy once they’re cooled completely. You can also skip this step and use already roasted shelled peanuts.
Cut the onions into thin strips and cut the leeks and bell pepper into bite sized chunks
Marinate the chicken. Mix together the chicken with all the marinade ingredients in a bowl and set aside for 20 minutes.
Prepare the sauce. Mix together all the sauce ingredients in a medium bowl and set aside.
Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a wok over high heat. Sear the chicken, remove from the wok to a bowl, and set aside.
Turn the heat to low and add another tablespoon oil. Add the onions, garlic, ginger, chilies, and Sichuan peppercorn powder and cook for a minute or two until fragrant.
Add in the veggies (cut leeks and bell pepper) and cook until softened.

Add the chicken back to the pan and turn up the heat to high. Stir-fry for a minute and then use your finger to stir up your prepared sauce (the cornstarch will have settled to the bottom, so make sure it’s well incorporated). Add the sauce to the wok and stir-fry for another minute. The sauce should thicken very quickly.
Finally, add the peanuts. Give everything a final stir and serve.

title: Chicken and Dumplings

ingredients.element: chicken thighs (bone in and skin on)
ingredients.fdcQuery: Chicken, broilers or fryers, dark meat, thigh, meat only, raw
Milk, lowfat, fluid, 1% milkfat, with added vitamin A and vitamin D
Milk, lowfat, fluid, 1% milkfat, with added vitamin A and vitamin D

steps.text: Trim off excess fat on chicken thighs and then pat-dry the skin. Season both sides with kosher salt & black pepper.
Heat up Instant Pot using Sauté More function. Wait until it says HOT. This prevents chicken thighs from sticking to the pot.
Add 1 tbsp (15g) unsalted butter to Instant Pot, ensure the whole bottom is coated with butter.
Add 4 chicken thighs (skin side) in Instant Pot and brown for 3.5 minutes. Then, flip and brown for 2 minutes. Set aside and repeat for remaining chicken thighs. Put all the chicken to the side.
Prep all the veggies: mince garlic, chop all veggies into bite sized pieces (celery and onion can be chopped smaller)

Saute Onions, Garlic, & Veggies: Add chopped onions, season with a pinch of Kosher salt & black pepper. Saute onions for roughly 2.5 minutes. Add minced garlic cloves and saute for 30 seconds until fragrant. Add chopped carrots & celery, then saute for 2 minutes. Add 6 bay leaves + dried thyme, then let it cook for a minute until fragrant.
Deglaze: Pour in 1 cup (250ml) unsalted chicken stock and deglaze by scrubbing all the brown bits off the bottom of the pot. Give it a quick mix.
Add potato chunks, 4 cups (1000ml) unsalted chicken stock, browned chicken thighs + all meat juices. Make sure all the chicken is fully submerged in the liquid.
Make Dumplings Dough: mix 2 cups (250g) all-purpose flour and 1 tbsp (12g) baking powder (NOT Baking Soda) in a bowl.
In a saucepan, heat 3/4 cup (188ml) milk, 1 tsp (5g) salt, 1 tbsp (15ml) olive oil, and 2 tbsp (28g) unsalted butter - whisk to ensure fully incorporated.
Pour milk mixture into the flour mixture and mix until just incorporated  - do not overmix.
Drop dumplings on top of the soup mixture using two spoons (I made about 18 dumplings)
With Venting Knob at Venting Position, close the lid and turn Venting Knob to Sealing Position.
Pressure cook at High Pressure for 3 minutes + Natural Release for 15 minutes.
Open the lid and set aside dumplings. Remove and discard the bay leaves.  In a large bowl, shred chicken and discard the skin & bones.
Thicken Chicken and Dumplings: Bring the soup to a simmer. Add in frozen green peas. Stir and break some of the potatoes to thicken soup.

In a mixing bowl, whisk together 1/4 cup all-purpose flour and a few ladles of soup until the flour fully dissolves, add in 1/4 cup of milk (optional).  Thicken the soup to the desired thickness by mixing in the flour mixture one third at a time.

Season & Serve: Return shredded chicken and dumplings to pot. Add in Worcestershire sauce, a bit of vinegar/ lemon juice, fish sauce and more salt as needed (I didn't need any additional as the chicken had been well seasoned and i used salted chicken stock)
Serve soup with a few dumplings (about 3 dumplings per serving)

notes: For storing leftovers: keep dumplings and soup apart. To reheat: add a few tbsp of water to the soup serving, add dumplings on top and then microwave with a lid on

steps.text: Make roasted potaotes: chop potatoes into bite sized pieces and toss with oil (0.5 Tbsp) and salt. Cook in air fryer at 375F (ROAST) for about 12-15 minutes until crispy
In a frying pan, heat 1 tbsp of oil and cook garlic and onions until fragrant, add in rest of veggies (bell pepper and mushrooms) and cook until softened.

Poach eggs: bring a shallow pot of water to a boil and then reduce to a gentle simmer/ light boil . Drop in 1 tsp of vinegar and then lower each egg one at a time (usually crack egg into a 1/3 cup measuring spoon) and cook for 5 minutes. Remove each egg with a slotted spoon and place in cold water
Plate by adding 1 serving of potatoes, 1 serving of cooked veggies and placing 2 eggs on top.
Serve with salsa and guacamole (can optionally add cheese)

title: Vietnamese lemongrass Noodle Bowl

ingredients.fdcQuery: Chicken, dark meat, thigh, meat only, with added solution, raw

ingredients.element: garlic cloves , finely chopped or minced

steps.text: Combine all marinade ingredients into a food processer and grind until very finely chopped (the lemongrass has to be broken down quite a bit so that it can be eaten)
Marinate the chicken in the sauce for at least 1 hour (up to 2 hours)
Line air fryer baskets with aluminum foil and then cook chicken thighs in a single layer in the air fryer at 390F for 14 minutes
Allow chicken to cool slightly and then cut into strips; toss the cooked chicken in the excess marinade from the air fryer
Soak the vermicelli noodles in boiling water for 2-3 minutes and then drain and rinse under cold water
Slice all the veggies into very thin strips (lettuce, carrots, and cucumber)
Cook the spring rolls in the air fryer: cook in a single layer on 390F for about 8 minutes or until crispy

To assemble each bowl: put a portion of noodle at the bottom of a bowl, add in a few tablespoons of Nuoc Cham Sauce, top with veggies and approximately 1 thigh worth of meat and 3 spring rolls. Drizzle with hoisin sauce and top with lime juice and cilantro

notes: - topping options: hoisin sauce, siracha, lime juice, crushed peanuts and cilantro

ingredients.element: red birds eye chilli , finely chopped

steps.text: Finely mince garlic cloves and chili
Mix all ingredients together
Serve with Lemongrass Chicken Noodle Bowls or spring rolls

title: Lentil Soup
notes: Serve with feta cheese crumbled on top and a pita on the side for dipping.

steps.text: Prepare Falafel recipe as written
Prepare Greek Couscous Salad as written
Microwave tortilla for 15 seconds to soften
spread 2 tbsp of baba ghanoush on the wrap (can substitute for hummus)
Place 140gm of greek couscous salad on the wrap , top with 4 falafels
Wrap tortilla (tuck sides in and then roll upwards until tightly sealed)
Optional but highly recommended: grill the wrap (flap side down) on a lightly oiled frying pan until crispy and sealed.
Serve with Tzatziki sauce or enjoy as is - it's delicious on it's own!
